original_text: So the king of Israel went with the king of Judah and the king of Edom. And when they had made a circuitous march of seven days, there was no water for the army or for the animals that followed them.
korean_text: 이스라엘 왕과 유다 왕과 에돔 왕이 가더니 길을 둘러 간 지 칠 일에 군사와 따라가는 가축을 먹일 물이 없는지라

sentences.original_text: So the king of Israel went with the king of Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 이스라엘 왕은 유다 왕과 함께 갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: And when they had made a circuitous march of seven days,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 이레 동안 돌아서 행군했을 때,

sentences.original_text: there was no water for the army
or for the animals that followed them.
